import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import styles from '../styles.module.scss'; const AccountInfo = ({ account, socket }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [entries, setEntries] = useState(0); const [win, setWin] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { if(socket == null ) return; socket.emit('load-account', account.address); }, [socket]) useEffect(() => { if(socket == null) return; socket.on('get-account', data => setData(data.accountStatistics)); }, [socket]) return (
